issue.title: [C++] Refactor GcsFileSystem tests helpers
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15055](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15055). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We have duplicate code to create a hierarchy of directories with some files in them. We should refactor the functions.
